scripts.install: npm run install:library && npm run install:service
scripts.install:library: cd packages/polyfill-library && npm install && npm link && cd ../..
scripts.install:service: cd packages/polyfill-service && npm link polyfill-library && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.ci:library: cd packages/polyfill-library && npm install && npm link && cd ../..
scripts.ci:service: cd packages/polyfill-service && npm link polyfill-library && npm install && cd ../..
